pullRequest.title: Verify before getting element from a list
pullRequest.bodyText:
We are witnessing spurious ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when
accessing type parameter. Add verification that will produce more useful
failure message.
For #5758

nodes.bodyText: may be replace size with parameter count in the error message?

commit.message:
Verify before getting element from a list

We are witnessing spurious `ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException` when
accessing type parameter. Add verification that will produce more useful
failure message.
